author: Edward Gonzales

review: This was very easy to intall and set up as promised. It accesses a lot of content, including Amazon original content. The total entertainment value compared to the cost of this kit is well worth it. As a Prime member, I was a little disappointed to learn that not all content is free. The misunderstanding may be mine. Also, was disappointed to realize that if you do pay for a program you want to see, some of the programs give you a time limit in which to watch it. This is more restrictive. On the plus side, you do get to watch a "Preview" of all selections (there are a lot). Also, if you experience program interruptus, Amazon seems to remember where you left off. One thing that would make the experience better is having a way to organize you "Watch List" into categories. We're not using the Fire TV Stick as frequently as we thought we would, but it's at our fingertips if we want something more than syndicated reruns.(PSSST...Amazon, when are you going to bring us another season of Alpha House?!?)
